Package adk.selectorswitch

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    MainActivity  
    SelectorDial
    SelectorDial describes the dial used in a selector switch.
    SelectorKnob
    SelectorKnob describes the knob used in the selector switch and has the structure shown here.
    SelectorKnobAnimator
    SelectorKnobAnimator is built on top of AsyncTask and is used primarily by SelectorSwitch to animate the rotation of its knob when the mode of the switch is changed.
    SelectorSwitch
    SelectorSwitch is a UI component for android (5.0+) inspired by the ACTIVE DYNAMICS PANEL found in most of the McLaren road cars.
    SelectorUtil
    SelectorUtil is a utility helper class used mainly by SelectorDial and SelectorKnob classes.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    IllegalSelectorException
    IllegalSelectorException is built on top of Exception to offer basic exception handling to the SelectorSwitch UI Component.
